titleStmt.title: To our reverend and vvell-beloved brethren the Assembly of Divines at VVestminster, the ministers of London, and all other well-affected brethren of the ministery in England. Presented to the ministers of London this 13th. of December 1647. Decemb. 13. 1647. Imprimatur Ja. Cranford.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly.
Douglas, Robert, 1594-1674.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: Edinburgh 26 of Nove. 1647. Subscribed in name of the Commission of the Generall Assembly of the Kirke of Scotland by M. Robert Douglas moderator.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
